Yoko.is

Hay! My name is Yoko.

I live in Brooklyn and work at Etsy as a product designer. I co-host a podcast called So Where Are You From?. When I’m not doing either of those things, I’m probably dancing, exploring, or internetting. I like pandas.

I’m trying to slowly wean myself off social media and instead send out updates on my life via email. If you’re interested, you can sign up here. In the meantime, I still post on Instagram.

Website designed and built using Jekyll.
